column7772: title:"All You Need to Know About Apartments for Sale in Dubai Marina"
column7773: body:"\u003Cp\u003EDubai Marina is a vibrant waterfront community located in the heart of Dubai. It is a man-made canal city stretching about 3.5 km along the Gulf shoreline. The sought-after neighbourhood is home to around 200 residential towers offering a mix of high-end apartments with scenic views of the Dubai skyline. There are more than 3
column7774: 000 live listings on Bayut for Dubai Marina apartments for sale. Interested buyers can explore their options using the search bar and filters for unit type
column7775:
configuration and credible companies in Dubai Marina.

Sales Trends for Apartments in Dubai Marina

Dubai Marina real estate is known for offering luxury properties with stunning views and modern amenities. The area has a wide range of apartments including studios
column7779: 4 and 5 bedrooms with panoramic views of the marina
column7780: the Arabian Gulf and the surrounding cityscape. These apartments in high-rise towers also feature shared facilities such as play areas
column7781: pools and fitness centres.  \u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003EAverage annual rents may vary based on \u003Ca href=\"https:\u002F\u002Fwww.bayut.com\u002Ffloorplans\u002Fdubai\u002Fdubai-marina\u002F\"\u003Efloor plans in Dubai Marina\u003C\u002Fa\u003E
column7784:
offering many options for different preferences and budgets.

The sale price of studio apartments with an average covered area of 600 sq. ft. is AED 1M
The sale price of 1-bed apartments with an average covered area of 800sq. ft. is AED 1.5M
The sale price of 2-bed apartments with an average covered area of 1
column7785: 365 sq. ft. is AED 2.5M\u003Cbr \u002F\u003E\r\nThe sale price of 3-bed apartments with an average covered area of 2
column7786: 071 sq. ft. is AED 4M\u003Cbr \u002F\u003E\r\nThe sale price of 4-bed apartments with an average covered area of 3
column7787: 063 sq. ft. is AED 6M\u003Cbr \u002F\u003E\r\nThe sale price of 5-bed apartments with an average covered area of 6
column7788: 527 sq. ft. is AED 18M\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\r\n\r\n\u003Cp\u003ETransactional data from the Dubai Land Department (DLD) shows 463 sales transactions with a collective value of AED 1.6 billion made in Dubai in October 2023. Currently
column7789:
the average advertised sales price for apartments in Dubai stands at AED 2.6M. 

Buying Waterfront Apartments in Dubai Marina

Dubai Marina is the premier choice for buying waterfront apartments in Dubai as per our Q3 2023 Dubai Sales Market Report. The strategic location and Riviera-style living are two major reasons for its popularity. Interested buyers can check out the apartments for sale in DEC Towers and Marina Gate. 

On average
column7790: a studio apartment in DEC Towers costs AED 908k while a 1-bedroom apartment in Marina Pinnacle is available for AED 1.2M. Manchester Tower is another high-rise tower with studios for sale that cost AED 806k and 1-bedroom flats for AED 1.2M on average. You can also check out the listings for luxury apartments in The Torch
column7791:
Ciel Tower and Escan Marina Tower.

Types of Apartments Available for Sale in Dubai Marina

Dubai Marina offers a diverse range of apartments for sale catering to various preferences and lifestyles. These units can be categorised into ready-to-move and off-plan apartments.

As the name suggests
column7792:
ready apartments allow you to move in immediately. Interested buyers usually prefer these units as they can be leased out and offer a consistent return on investment. Ready apartments are offered at a higher initial price with fixed layouts and these units are generally available in both furnished and unfurnished variants. 

Off-plan apartments are under-construction residential units with a lower initial price as compared to ready apartments. Developers offer flexible payment options till the completion of the project. These units can be customised in terms of layouts. Buying an off-plan apartment provides significant investment potential as the value and price of the property increase by the time they are completed.

There are a number of furnished apartments available for sale in Dubai Marina. These ready-to-move-in apartments can be found in many projects in the area

These towers are known for unique architectural designs
column7798:

What is the cost of buying property in Dubai?

The cost of buying property in Dubai includes the following elements:

  • Asking price
  • Property registration fees
  • DLD fees and administration charges
  • Agency fee/commission
  • Conveyance fee
  • VAT (where applicable)

In addition
column7804: if you are \u003Ca href=\"https:\u002F\u002Fwww.bayut.com\u002Fmybayut\u002Fhow-get-mortgage-dubai\u002F\"\u003Ebuying property on a mortgage\u003C\u002Fa\u003E
column7805:
you’ll have to pay the bank charges as well as property valuation charges.

What is the process to buy off-plan properties in Dubai?

The process to purchase off-plan properties in Dubai is simple. You simply need to:

  • Find the right property
  • Ensure the developer’s reliability
  • Get in touch with a good realtor
  • Assess your financial standing and apply for a mortgage
column7806:
(if needed)
  • Pay the initial deposit and book your property
  • Sign the Sales Purchase Agreement (SPA)
